member.name: T:TypeSafe.InputAxis
member.summary: Wrapper for a Unity input axis

member.name: F:TypeSafe.InputAxis.Name
member.summary: Name of the axis that can be passed to Input.GetAxis(name).

member.name: P:TypeSafe.InputAxis.Value
member.summary: The current value for this input axis. Equivalent to calling Input.GetAxis

member.name: P:TypeSafe.InputAxis.RawValue
member.summary: The current raw value for this input axis. Equivalent to calling Input.GetAxisRaw

member.name: P:TypeSafe.InputAxis.IsPressed
member.summary: The current pressed state for this input axis. Equivalent to calling Input.GetButton.

member.name: P:TypeSafe.InputAxis.Down
member.summary: Was this button pressed down this frame. Equivalent to calling Input.GetButtonDown.

member.name: P:TypeSafe.InputAxis.Up
member.summary: Was this button released this frame. Equivalent to calling Input.GetButtonUp.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.InputAxis.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new InputAxis object

member.name: M:TypeSafe.InputAxis.op_Implicit(TypeSafe.InputAxis)~System.String
member.summary: Implicitly convert the InputAxis to a string that can be used in Input.GetAxisX() methods.

member.name: T:TypeSafe.Layer
member.summary: Wrapper class for a Unity layer name/index combo.

member.name: P:TypeSafe.Layer.name
member.summary: Name of the sorting layer, as might be passed to LayerMask.NameToLayer

member.name: P:TypeSafe.Layer.index
member.summary: Layer number, as assigned to gameObject.layer

member.name: P:TypeSafe.Layer.mask
member.summary: Layer mask, as might be passed to Physics.Raycast

member.name: M:TypeSafe.Layer.op_Implicit(TypeSafe.Layer)~System.Int32
member.summary: Implicitly convert the Layer to an int that can be assigned to gameObject.layer;

member.name: M:TypeSafe.Layer.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a new Layer object.

member.name: T:TypeSafe.PrefabResource
member.summary: Specialized Resource for prefabs.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.PrefabResource.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a PrefabResource instance.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.PrefabResource.Instantiate
member.summary: Instantiate a new instance of this prefab and return the result.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.PrefabResource.Instantiate(UnityEngine.Transform)
member.summary: Instantiate a new instance of this prefab with .
member.param: The transform the object will be parented to.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.PrefabResource.Instantiate(UnityEngine.Transform,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Instantiate a new instance of this prefab with .
member.param: The transform the object will be parented to.
If when assigning the parent the original world position should be maintained.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.PrefabResource.Instantiate(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Quaternion)
member.summary: Instantiate a new instance of this prefab at position and rotation and return the result.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.PrefabResource.Instantiate(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Instantiate a new instance of this prefab at and return the result.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.PrefabResource.Instantiate(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Quaternion,UnityEngine.Transform)
member.summary: Instantiate a new instance of this prefab at , with and .
member.param: The transform the object will be parented to.

member.name: T:TypeSafe.IResource
member.summary: Represents a generic Unity Resource

member.name: P:TypeSafe.IResource.Type
member.summary: Type of the resource

member.name: P:TypeSafe.IResource.Name
member.summary: Name of the resource (ie when calling unityObject.name)

member.name: P:TypeSafe.IResource.Path
member.summary: Path string that is passed to Resources.Load(...) to load this resource object.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.IResource.Load
member.summary: Get the object for this resource. If the resource has not been loaded before, this will block until it is loaded. Subsequent calls to this method will return the cached reference to the resource.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.IResource.Unload
member.summary: Unload the resource from memory and clear the cached reference.

member.name: T:TypeSafe.Resource`1
member.summary: A type-safe reference to a unity object in the Resources folder.
member.typeparam: Unity Object type of this resource

member.name: P:TypeSafe.Resource`1.Type
member.summary: Type of resource pointed to.

member.name: P:TypeSafe.Resource`1.Name
member.summary: Name of the resource (ie when calling unityObject.name)

member.name: P:TypeSafe.Resource`1.Path
member.summary: Path string that is passed to Resources.Load(...) to load this resource object.

member.name: P:TypeSafe.Resource`1.IsLoaded
member.summary: True if the resource has been loaded.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.Resource`1.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a Resource pointer object with the given path
member.param: Path to pass to Unity Resources.Load that will load this resource.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.Resource`1.Load
member.summary: Get the object for this resource. If the resource has not been loaded before, this will block until it is loaded. Subsequent calls to this method will return the cached reference to the resource.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.Resource`1.Unload
member.summary: Unload the resource from memory and clear the cached reference.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.Resource`1.LoadAsync
member.summary: Returns a object that can be used in a yield operation. The resource will be loaded in a background thread. Calling Load() or IsLoaded will block until async load is completed.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.Resource`1.op_Implicit(TypeSafe.Resource{`0})~`0
member.summary: Implicitly convert the resource to the Unity type, loading it if necessary.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.Resource`1.ToString
member.summary: Return a formatted string describing this resource pointer.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.Resource`1.BlockOnAsync
member.summary: If there is an async request in progress, block and assign it the reference fields

member.summary: Scene index, as usually passed to Application.LoadLevel(int)

member.summary: Create a new Scene object.

member.name: M:TypeSafe.Scene.Load
member.summary: Calls Application.LoadLevel(...).

member.name: M:TypeSafe.Scene.LoadAdditive
member.summary: Calls Application.LoadLevelAdditive(...).

member.name: M:TypeSafe.Scene.LoadAdditiveAsync
member.summary: Calls Application.LoadLevelAdditiveAsync(...).

member.name: M:TypeSafe.Scene.LoadAsync
member.summary: Calls Application.LoadLevelAsync(...).

member.name: T:TypeSafe.SortingLayer
member.summary: Wrapper class for a Unity sorting layer name/id combo.

member.name: P:TypeSafe.SortingLayer.name
member.summary: Name of the sorting layer, as assigned to SpriteRenderer.sortingLayerName

member.name: P:TypeSafe.SortingLayer.id
member.summary: Unique ID, as assigned to SpriteRenderer.sortingLayerID

member.name: M:TypeSafe.SortingLayer.op_Implicit(TypeSafe.SortingLayer)~System.Int32
member.summary: Implicitly convert the SortingLayer to an int that can be assigned to SpriteRenderer.sortingLayerId;

member.summary: Implicitly convert the SortingLayer object to a string that can be assigned to SpriteRenderer.sortingLayerName;

member.summary: Create a new SortingLayer object.
